title: Victoria's Secret Fashion Show books musical acts
text:

Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Victoria's Secret Fashion Show books musical acts Maeve McDermott, USA TODAY 12:20 p.m. EDT October 13, 2015 The three performers at this year's VS Fashion Show. (Photo: CBS, USA TODAY, Getty) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
After Taylor Swift and friends soundtracked last year's Victoria's Secret Fashion Show, the VS Angels will walk the runway to a different tune this year—courtesy of superstar performers Rihanna, Selena Gomez and the Weeknd. 
The three performers were announced as the official musical guests for Victoria's Secret's 2015 show, which airs on Tuesday, Dec. 8 on CBS. 
The singers won't be the only big names on the catwalk—they'll be joined by the A-list models Adriana Lima, Alessandra Ambrosio, Behati Prinsloo, Candice Swanepoel and Lily Aldridge. 
Expect Michael Jackson grooves from the Weeknd, sultry pop from Gomez, and from Rihanna, adventurous and sexy looks that'll rival anything the Angels wear that evening—and if we're lucky, some new music from the album she announced last week. The Victoria's Secret Fashion Show is held in London this year. Take an insider's look at all the excitement and behind the scenes scoop.
